backend/main.mo: Defines core data models for posts, messages, job posts, applications, coach profiles, and includes comparison helpers, storage maps, and authorization/storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI attachment viewer updates with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend components, hooks, pages, and styling files across the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme config defining light and dark mode OKLCH color variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling Internet Identity auth, actor initialization, profile loading with timeout, and routing between dashboard and landing page.
frontend/src/components/AdminBadge.tsx: Simple UI badge that displays an ADMIN label with a shield icon.
frontend/src/components/AdminBanner.tsx: Admin-only alert banner that polls for new notifications and allows dismissal via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/CoachDirectory.t: Coach directory with search, follow/unfollow, admin delete actions, and profile detail modal integration.
frontend/src/components/CoachProfileDeta: Displays a detailed modal for a coach profile with tabs, posts, job listings, follow/unfollow actions, and admin/delete controls using various queries.
frontend/src/components/EditPostModal.ts: Modal for editing an existing post, including updating content and adding or removing attachments before saving changes.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Static footer displaying copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling login/logout, theme switching, and user avatar/profile menu with admin support.
frontend/src/components/ImageCropper.tsx: Empty placeholder component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/JobBoard.tsx: Job board UI enabling posting, viewing, applying to, and deleting job listings with dialogs and profile lookups.
frontend/src/components/MessagingHub.tsx: Messaging interface allowing users to view connections, select a chat, and exchange direct messages with profiles.
frontend/src/components/MyProfile.tsx: Component for displaying and editing the current user's profile, including bio details, positions, roles, and photo upload with preview handling.
frontend/src/components/PostAttachmentRe: Renders post attachments by detecting type and displaying images, videos, PDFs, or download links accordingly.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial profile setup, allowing users to enter details, select positions and roles, and upload a profile photo.
frontend/src/components/SocialFeed.tsx: Main social feed component handling post creation, sorting, interactions, and attachment rendering with support for comments and likes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and utilities for login, logout, and identity state management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, photos, and related coach data via the backend actor. Includes error handling, cache updates, and integration with authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes. Applies global background, text, and border styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers. Loads global styles and renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements a tab-based dashboard switching between feed, coaches, jobs, messages, and profile sections. Uses UI components and icons to structure navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public landing page with hero content, feature cards, and login integration via Internet Identity. Displays branding and marketing layout for the app.
frontend/src/utils/attachmentTypes.ts: Utility functions to detect whether a file is a video, PDF, or image based on MIME type and filename.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including sessionStorage fallback and hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens aligned with CSS variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current attachment-viewer refactor progress, architecture notes, existing features, and known issues.
